projects.title: Chelsea F.C. Fan Club Website
projects.description: Chelsea FC Funclub website, developed using React.js and styled with CSS, offers an interactive platform for fans to connect and engage with the club. This website provides a seamless experience for fans to join the funclub, add new members.

projects.title: To Do App
projects.description: The TODO List app is a React.js project built for managing tasks and staying organized. With a clean and intuitive user interface, users can easily add and delete tasks. The app features CSS styling for a visually appealing and user-friendly experience. Stay productive and keep track of your tasks effortlessly with this handy TODO List app.

projects.title: Forum
projects.description: Forum website developed using React.js, Express.js and MongoDB. User can register as a new user, ask questions and get answers.
